body_html:
While a binary release with the updated libraries is certainly desirable, I might be able to help you with build instructions (or even prebuilt pip-packages for Ubuntu).

If you want, you can create a new StackOverflow question with the tensorflow tag, and post the link here so I can have a look.
Please include the following info:

  • Operating System
  • CUDA version
  • cuDNN version
  • How you installed CUDA
  • Available compilers on your system

body:
While a binary release with the updated libraries is certainly desirable, I might be able to help you with build instructions (or even prebuilt pip-packages for Ubuntu).

If you want, you can create a new StackOverflow question with the `tensorflow` tag, and post the link here so I can have a look.
Please include the following info:
- Operating System
- CUDA version
- cuDNN version
- How you installed CUDA
- Available compilers on your system
